title: Machine Learning Engineer (ML инженер)
description:
Machine Learning Engineer (ML инженер) - специалист, который разрабатывает, дообучает, оптимизирует модели машинного обучения в продакшн.

Общие задачи ML инженера:
1.⁠ ⁠Подбор и дообучение моделей
1.1 Использование готовых моделей
1.2 Дообучение (fine-tuning) на специфичных данных
2.⁠ ⁠Оптимизация и развертывание моделей
2.1 Сжатие моделей
2.2 Оптимизация скорости работы
2.3 Разворачивает модели в API
3.⁠ ⁠Разработка пайплайнов машинного обучения
3.1 Автоматизация обучения
3.2 Настройка сбора и обработки данных
4.⁠ ⁠Интеграция моделей в продакшн
4.1 Настройка обработки запросов от пользователей
4.2 Оптимизация нагрузки (балансировка, кеширование)
4.3 Мониторинг работы моделей (A/B тесты, логирование)

Требуется знание:
1.⁠ ⁠Язык программирование Python
2.⁠ ⁠Фреймворки - PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, DeepSpeed
3.⁠ ⁠Обучение - MLflow и иные инструменты
4.⁠ ⁠Понимание облачных сервисов ☁️
5.⁠ ⁠Понимание работы с GPU: NVIDIA CUDA, Tensor Cores, TPUs ⌨️

Требование под нашу задачу:
1.⁠ ⁠Опыт работы с моделями преобразования звука в текст (STT models) ️
2.⁠ ⁠Опыт с моделями GPT - DeepSeek, написание промтов, дообучение
3.⁠ ⁠Написание API и разворачивание в продакшн
4.⁠ ⁠Понимание работы обработки Real-Time обработки звука (WebSocket \ WebRTC)
5.⁠ ⁠Умение оптимизировать и балансировать нагрузку ‍♀️
6.⁠ ⁠Умение дообучать готовые модели (Fine-Tuning)

MacDent - CRM система для стоматологий и клиник, успешно помогает компаниям автоматизировать и систематизировать бизнес-процессы. На текущий момент 1000+ клиник активно пользуются нашей CRM-системой по всему Казахстану.

Мы активно развиваемся и хотим найти в команду профессионала в маркетинге, который любит маркетинг и IT, обожает сам зарабатывать и помогать в этом деле своим клиентам и команде.

Условия:

Оклад определим после собеседование
Зарплата поступает до 5 числа каждого месяца
Возможность получить опционы компании с перспективой продажи в будущем
Оплачиваются курсы
Предоставляются доступ к обучающим материалам
Личное обучение от команды и генерального директора по смежным темам
Здоровая атмосфера в команде
Уважение личных границ и адекватное отношение
Отсутствие переработок
Бесплатный теннис
Массаж для позвоночника
Библиотека с художественной и профессиональной литературой
Соседство с крупными IT-компаниями, такими как Astana Hub, TikTok, Yandex Cloud, reKassa и другие
Работа в офисе 5/2, с 09:30 до 18:30

Если вы любите IT, то обретите свой икигаи работая в компании MacDent, и в окружении лидеров IT-индустрии и здоровой команды стремящейся к развитию!


Внимание! В сопроводительном письме укажите ваши кейсы и результаты работ.

title: Data Engineer (Golang)
description:
Wisebits — международный IT-холдинг с сильной технической командой!
Наш ключевой продукт — высоконагруженный видеохостинг, которым ежедневно пользуются миллионы людей по всему миру. Более чем за 15 лет на рынке мы сформировали профессиональную команду, где ценятся вовлечённость и инициативность.
Если хочешь работать с high-load продуктом и иметь возможность влиять на его развитие — присоединяйся к нам!

В нашу Data Science команду нужен Go-разработчик с интересом к Machine Learning. Новому члену команды предстоит работать над высоконагруженными сервисами.

Основные задачи:

ETL, разработка сервисов сбора, хранения и доступа к статистике и данным;
Оптимизация/создание pipeline для запуска ML решений в production;
Выполнять эпизодические задачи на анализ данных;
Обработка и агрегация данных для отчетов.

Стек: Golang, Kubernetes, ClickHouse, MySQL, MongoDB, Kafka, Redis.

Требования:

Опыт разработки на Go от 3 лет: Глубокое понимание языка и опыт написания эффективного кода с акцентом на обработку данных.
Знание баз данных: Опыт работы с ClickHouse, MySQL и MongoDB.
Контейнеризация и оркестрация: Понимание принципов работы с Kubernetes.
Протоколы и API: Опыт разработки HTTP/gRPC API.
Системы обмена сообщениями и кэширования: Опыт работы с Kafka и Redis.
Алгоритмы и структуры данных: Хорошее понимание и умение применять на практике.
Коммуникационные навыки: Способность эффективно взаимодействовать с командами Data Science и другими отделами.

Дополнительные плюсы:

Опыт создания дашбордов в Grafana.
Знание принципов работы высоконагруженных систем.
Интерес к машинному обучению и опыт поддержки A/B-экспериментов.

Эта позиция для вас, если:

Вы любите данные и еще больше любите технологии их обработки;
Вам нравится принимать решения и непосредственно участвовать в развитии продуктов;
Стремитесь к приобретению знаний в управлении и работе с данными, машинном обучении.

Что мы предлагаем:

Отсутствие бюрократии — гибкие условия работы;
Расширенный пакет бенефитов: медицинская страховка, покрытие налогов, курсы иностранных языков, профессиональное обучение, а также необходимая для работы техника;
Ежегодный пересмотр заработной платы и профессиональный рост;
Поддержку при релокации: мы берем на себя расходы по переезду для тебя и твоей семьи, включая покупку билетов, визовую поддержку и оплату первого месяца жилья.
Дружную и интернациональную команду, которая ценит профессионализм и сотрудничество.

title: Data Scientist Middle+/Senior
ML Engineer
description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join our team

focused on training and deploying machine learning models and fine-tuning large language

models (LLMs). This role will be central to developing efficient, scalable, and domain-specific

ML/LLM solutions that power our AI products.

Responsibilities:

• Design, implement, and optimize training pipelines for small-scale machine learning models

(e.g., decision trees, gradient boosting, small neural nets, CNN).

• Fine-tune large pre-trained language models (e.g., LLaMA, Mistral, Qwen, GPT) for specific

tasks using supervised learning, reinforcement learning (RLHF), or parameter-efficient

techniques (LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT).

• Conduct dataset preparation, preprocessing, and augmentation for both small and large

models.

• Perform hyperparameter tuning and model evaluation using appropriate metrics.

• Monitor and optimize model performance, inference speed, and memory footprint.

• Contribute to internal tools and libraries that streamline ML experimentation and deployment.

Requirements:

• Strong programming skills in Python and experience with ML frameworks like PyTorch,

HuggingFace Transformers, or scikit-learn.

• Experience in training and fine-tuning large language models using modern toolkits (e.g.,

PEFT, DeepSpeed, FSDP).

• Familiarity with distributed training, mixed-precision training, and checkpoint management.

• Solid understanding of ML fundamentals, including model selection, training/validation

workflows, and performance evaluation.

• Hands-on experience with data handling, feature engineering, and synthetic data generation.

• Working knowledge of experiment tracking tools (Weights & Biases).

• Familiarity with cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure) or on-premise GPU clusters.

• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment.

Nice to Have:

• Experience with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), prompt tuning, or instruction tuning.

• Exposure to quantization and model compression techniques.• Experience with deploying ML models using APIs or serving frameworks (e.g., FastAPI, Triton

Inference Server).

title: MLOps AWS/Data Scientist
description:
Удаленно, рабочий часовой пояс GMT+4. Нужен хороший устный английский не ниже B2!!!!

О нас:

SHARP DEVELOPERS – разработчик программного обеспечения для мобильных устройств и веб-сайтов для заказчиков из США, Европы и России.

Наши клиенты — компании-разработчики продуктов в различных сферах: финтех, путешествия, спорт, медицина, развлечения, медиа, промышленность. Мы работаем над более чем 30 проектами — выберите для себя интересный!

- Мы распределённая команда и у нас обширная география: кто-то работает в Турции, кто-то в Армении, Грузии, Казахстане, Таджикистане, Беларуси, странах ЕС, с Маврикия, кто-то разбросан по России - все мы встречаемся в общих Slack-чатах, где на русском языке обсуждаем и празднуем вместе важные события онлайн и делимся экспертизой, не вставая с дивана. Офиса нет - он прямо у вас дома, это 100% удалёнка в самом чистом ее виде.

На самих проектах общение (дейли и тд.) полностью на английском - поэтому мы ищем того, кто владеет английским языком на уровне не ниже B2.

В роли Data Scientist вы будете работать над извлечением значимой информации из больших наборов данных, разработкой моделей машинного обучения и созданием векторных баз знаний для улучшения бизнес-процессов и продуктов для наших зарубежных заказчиков (проекта под NDA).

Responsibilities:
To identify three ML models
To prepare data for three ML models
To test the models with the provided data (three iterations)
To prepare a report with ML model results (accuracy, recall, confidence)
To prepare instructions for the models' deployment in the form of PoC

Требования:

Hard:
Machine Learning & AI – Model selection, training, and optimization
Data Preparation & Preprocessing – Cleaning, feature engineering, handling missing values
Model Evaluation & Performance Metrics – Accuracy, recall, confidence, precision, F1-score
Statistical Analysis & Mathematics – Probability, linear algebra, hypothesis testing
ML Model Deployment – Writing PoC documentation, using AWS

Soft:
Problem-Solving – Ability to analyze complex datasets and derive insights
Analytical Thinking – Strong logical and critical thinking skills
Attention to Detail – Ensuring data quality and model accuracy
Communication Skills – Ability to present ML results to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
Collaboration & Teamwork – Working effectively with Architect, Engineers, Analysts, and Business teams
Time Management – Balancing multiple ML iterations and deadlines efficiently
Documentation & Reporting – Writing clear model evaluation reports and PoC deployment guides
Creativity & Innovation – Thinking outside the box for model improvements

Что мы предлагаем:

работа удаленного формата с понедельника по пятницу с гибким началом дня
предоставляется отпуск, оплачиваются больничные

постоянную рабочую практику английского языка в российско-американской команде

телемедицина для Вас и семьи

обучение по технологиям в оплачиваемое рабочее время

погружение в культуру западных компаний, стандарты работы за рубежом.

P.S. При отклике в сопроводительном письме укажите, пожалуйста, информацию:

Ваш username telegram
Локацию пребывания
Ваши зарплатные ожидания

Спасибо!

​​
skills: Английский язык,MLflow,Statistical Analysis System,Mathematical Modeling,Amazon Web Services,Английский — B2 — Средне-продвинутый,Русский — B2 — Средне-продвинутый

title: Production Engineer
company: ТОО Coca-Cola İçecek Kazakhstan  ( ТОО СП «Кока-Кола Алматы Боттлерс» )
description:
Job Identification
We are looking for a Production Engineer to be a part of our Supply Chain team located in Almaty.
Main Responsibilities
Plan, develop and realize protective and preventive maintenance programs in order to ensure compliance of machines
Ensure realization of planned production program
Carry out production according to the defined standards of process and taking actions to improve the process
Ensure that material yields are within company standards
Develop work safety procedures, make sure the team under supervision follows rules
Set up machine maintenances according to plans
Carry out criteria assessments and prepare the report for continuous improvement and performance follow up, present it to management, plan and implement necessary corrective-preventive actions
Determine training needs of foremen, operator and technician
Make sure the team under supervision follows safety procedures and rules
Manage the line OPEX budget and equipment investment projects
Improve the production methods for developing the quality of the packages & products
Manage the spare parts stock level
Ensure that the GMP and 6S rules are followed
Minimize the production costs and losses
Requirements
University Graduate (Mechanical, Electrical / Electronics Engineering)
Minimum 1-2 years experience in production field
Upper-Intermediate level of English
Good command of Microsoft Office programs
Strong communication and leadership skills
‘’We're an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, sex, color, national or social origin, ethnicity, religion, age, pregnancy, disability, sexual orientation, gender expression or political opinion.’’
What We Embrace:
“People Centered” Focus
Equal Salary Advocate
A Globally Diverse/An International Workplace
Inclusive Team-Building Activities
Digital Learning Opportunities
Leadership Exposure With Organizational Events
Inclusive Language And Culture
Social Clubs/Networks
Inclusive/Family-Friendly Policies
Who We Are
CCI is a multinational beverage company operating in Azerbaijan, Iraq, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Pakistan, Syria, Tajikistan, Turkey, Turkmenistan, and Uzbekistan. CCI produces, distributes, and sells The Coca-Cola Company's sparkling and still beverages. With 30 bottling plants, 3 fruit processing plants, and more than 10,000 employees in 11 countries, CCI offers a wide range of beverages to a consumer base of 430 million.
Our purpose at CCI is to create value for our employees, customers, consumers, and community. In line with our vision to become the best FMCG company, we put people at the core of everything we do. We achieve successful results with our people who come together as One Team, committing to live by our shared values of passion, integrity, accountability, and teamwork. Our ambition is to become a great place to work, which is inclusive, diverse, and inspiring, with its key organizational and leadership capabilities.
Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our commitment at CCI, that's why we nurture it in everything we do. We are proud to become the fourth company to obtain the EQUAL-SALARY global certification and proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer, covering in all our countries.
We take responsibility for the future with our Sustainability Commitments for 2030.
Focusing our roadmap on six main areas, including packaging, water, and climate on environmental issues; human rights, diversity & inclusion, and community investments on social issues, we pledged 9 commitments to continuously improve our efforts. To ensure that by the year 2030, 35% of newly hired individuals, 40% of managerial positions, and 50% of executive committee members are comprised of women.

title: Data Engineer (middle)
description:
inDrive is an international technological platform for transport and personal services. We are one of the top 2 mobile travel booking services in the world with over 150 million installs, over 2 billion trips, 800+ cities in 40+ countries.

inDrive is a product used by tens of millions of people every month. They make urban or intercity trips, order cargo transportation or courier delivery, look for work and call handymen to provide household services.

inDrive employs more than 3,000 employees, of which 550+ are developers, divided into 50+ cross-functional teams.

We are looking for a Data engineer who will help build a Data Warehouse as part of a team that develops various Data solutions for such business areas as Fintech, Safety, ESG, Government Relation and etc. We expect you to participate in architecture construction, data modeling, share knowledge and receive this knowledge. We are actively building our Data Warehouse and we know for sure that this part of the project is one of the most important parts of the product.

We create data solutions for Geo, Fintech, Safety, ESG, Government Relations, GDPR, and other areas. We are currently actively building a Data Warehouse — a key part of the product. We work with cutting-edge technologies (GCP, AWS, Airflow, Kafka, K8s) and make infrastructure and architectural decisions based on data.
One of the key areas is the development of a personalization system for our users. We are building a large-scale data infrastructure for analytics, machine learning, and real-time recommendations.

Our tech stack:

Languages: Python, SQL, Scala, Go
Frameworks: Spark, Apache Beam Storage and
Analytics: BigQuery, GCS, S3, Trino, other GCP and
AWS stack components Integration: Apache Kafka,
Google Pub/Sub, Debezium, Zero ETL, Firehose ETL: Airflow2
Infrastructure: Kubernetes, Terraform Development: GitHub, GitHub Actions, Jira

What tasks remain to be solved:

Develop the data driven culture within the company
Develop processes for data processing, storage, cleaning, and enrichment
Design and maintain data pipelines from collection to consumption
Develop APIs (REST, gRPC) for high load services
Create infrastructure for storing and processing large datasets on K8S, Terraform
Automate testing, validation, and monitoring of data
Participate in system design and architectural decision making

We expect from the candidate:

Who we are looking for Expert in Python 3.7+, experience with PySpark Deep knowledge of SQL
Extensive experience building ETLs with Airflow2 Industrial experience with Kubernetes
Understanding of data processing principles and algorithms
Excellent knowledge of OOP, design patterns, clean architecture
Proactivity, responsibility, and the ability to take ownership
Would be a plus: Experience with high load services DevOps skills and CI/CD automation experience

We offer:

Stable salary, official employment
Health insurance
Hybrid work mode and flexible schedule
Relocation package offered for candidates from other regions (only for Kazakhstan and Cyprus)
Access to professional counseling services including psychological, financial, and legal support
Discount club membership
Diverse internal training programs
Partially or fully paid additional training courses
All necessary work equipment

title: Data Scientist
company: ТОО IBA Astana Dev (АйБиЭй Астана Дев)

title: ML Engineer
description:
Обязанности:

Разработка и внедрение ML-моделей для платформы цифровых двойников (предиктивная аналитика, мониторинг оборудования, оптимизация производственных процессов)

Работа с временными рядами, данными датчиков (IoT, SCADA), облаками точек и пространственными данными (LiDAR)

Анализ больших объемов данных для выявления паттернов и аномалий

Интеграция моделей с существующей инфраструктурой платформы

Оценка качества моделей и оптимизация их производительности

Участие в разработке и поддержке архитектуры данных

Парсинг и структурирование данных из открытых и закрытых источников (сайты, API, документация оборудования)

Требования:

Опыт работы от 2 лет в области Data Science / Machine Learning

Глубокое понимание алгоритмов машинного обучения и анализа данных

Опыт работы с временными рядами, предиктивной аналитикой и обнаружением аномалий.

Практический опыт разработки моделей с использованием Python и основных библиотек (pandas, numpy, sklearn, tensorflow/pytorch, XGBoost)

Опыт работы с инструментами для визуализации данных (Plotly, matplotlib, Power BI)

Знание SQL и баз данных (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)

Опыт работы с большими объемами данных и облачными платформами (AWS, Azure) будет преимуществом

Понимание процессов CI/CD, опыт работы с Git

Дополнительные навыки (не обязательно):

Опыт работы с пространственными данными и облаками точек (Potree, Three.js, PDAL)

Опыт интеграции с системами SCADA, MES, ERP

Опыт работы с графовыми базами данных (Neo4j)

Опыт работы в промышленности, строительстве или инфраструктурных проектах

Умение работать с ИИ сервисами (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity)

Условия:

Работа на передовой технологий: цифровые двойники, AI, 3D-визуализация и крутые промышленные кейсы
Полная свобода действий: твои идеи не будут пылиться в столе, а сразу пойдут в прод!
Офис в инновационном хабе Astana Hub
work_format: Формат работы: на месте работодателя или гибрид

title: Стажер/Ассистент Менеджера продукта
description:
Job Opening: Product Manager Assistant (Intern / Junior Role)

Company: Verigram (verigram.ai)
Location: Hybrid / Office (Almaty, Kazakhstan)
Type: Full-time or part-time
Experience: students or recent graduates (up to 1 year of experience)
Compensation: Based on interview results

About Verigram

Verigram is a product IT company building solutions powered by computer vision and artificial intelligence. We help banks, fintech companies, and telecom verify customer identities using biometrics, document recognition, and digital signatures.

We’re currently launching a new wave of AI-powered products, including LLM-based assistants, and document automation tools. We're looking for a Product Manager Assistant who’s passionate about technology and wants to grow in a fast-moving, innovative environment.

What You’ll Do

- Support the CPO in developing AI-driven products such as LLM-powered chatbots, and digital assistants
- Conduct user research, market and competitor analysis, and gather feedback
- Assist in writing product requirements and user stories for the development team
- Work with analytics: track metrics and identify areas for improvement
- Prepare internal presentations, and planning materials
- Learn and grow every day by working closely with experienced product managers, engineers, and designers

What We’re Looking For

- Students or recent graduates (preferably in business, finance, math, IT or other fields)
- Interest in product management and modern technologies, especially artificial intelligence and LLMs (e.g., GPT)
- Quick learner with structured thinking and a proactive attitude
- Familiarity with tools like Google Sheets, Excel, Notion and Figma (a plus)
- Good writing and organizational skills


What We Offer

- Mentorship from experienced product managers and tech leads
- Opportunity to contribute to real AI product development (GPT-based tools)
- Flexible schedule that can accommodate your university classes
- A friendly, fast-paced, and supportive environment
- Office in Almaty with a good coffee machine ☕ and a strong engineering culture
- Opportunity to transition to a full-time position after the internship




Deadline to Apply:

April 30, 2025

If you're curious about how real AI products are built, want to work with technologies that shape the future, and learn from a team of professionals, we’d love to meet you.
work_format: Формат работы: на месте работодателя или гибрид

title: Creatio Certified Developer / Implementation Specialist
description:
Creatio Certified Developer and Implementation Specialist

3-6 years of experience

About us

Velvetech, is an American global software development company headquartered in Miami, FL, and with an office in Chicago, IL. Velvetech has its developers strategically distributed in 10+ global technical job markets to deliver the best in class software engineering and exceptional client services. We have 20+ years of experience in software and hardware development for clients all around the world, especially for US clients. As an official Microsoft Gold Partner, our company is listed in the top 5 software development companies in Illinois, USA.

Areas of expertise are consulting, development, implementation, and support of software solutions. We implement modern backend solutions that support microservices architecture with the following technologies: NET Core, Node.js, Java, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, RabbitMQ. For the web UI front-end development, we opt for React, or Angular, and for mobile development — Swift, Kotlin, Java. Most of the systems are designed for cloud infrastructures like AWS, Azure, GCP, and heavily rely on Docker, Kubernetes while modern CI/CD is made using GitLab CI or TeamCity. In September 2021, Velvetech LLC received the status of the official Training Provider of the International Institute of Business Analysis. This status gives us the right to conduct regular quality trainings for Business Analysts and anyone performing BA activities regardless their job title.

Principles are based on Agile Methodology, Scrum and Kanban. Various projects coded in GitLab or GitHub are built with multiple coordinated teams, collaborating via Jira, Confluence, MS Teams, and Slack. Velvetech constantly follows the Tech trends and actively cooperates with startups in such breakthrough areas as Machine Learning, the Internet of Things, Blockchain, FPGA, and AI.

Responsibilities
Work with clients to gather and analyze their business requirements
Design and configure Creatio solutions using low-code tools
Develop and customize workflows, user interfaces, and business logic within Creatio
Conduct thorough testing to ensure the quality and functionality of implemented solutions
Provide training and support to clients during and after the developing and implementation process
Create comprehensive documentation for implemented solutions and processes
Collaborate with business analysts, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure successful project delivery
Requirements
Creatio certification is required
At least 3+ years of experience in developing and implementing IT solutions, preferably with CRM or BPM platforms
Strong understanding of business process modeling and data integration methods
Proficiency in using no-code development tools for system customization
Deep knowledge of Creatio architecture, C#, JS, Angular
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
English knowledge at Intermediate level or higher
Benefits
Velvetech is in the TOP 5 development companies in the USA
You have FLEXIBLE working conditions and a COOPERATIVE environment
A COMPETITIVE and performance-based salary, fair compensation and benefits
Many CHALLENGING and exciting projects with new opportunities and learning
GROWTH opportunities, skills and competencies improvement, and professional certification
In-company TRAINING (English, Software / DevOps / Project management / Design / Business)
Our team

We are a friendly team of 170+ professionals where everyone is able to achieve high results and grows professionally not only due to their own knowledge and skills but also with the support of colleagues. Values that we highly appreciate are high performance, responsibility, respect, and loyalty. In order to have a highly motivated team, Velvetech invests in their people, additional education, certification, and others. You choose your career path and we are here to support you!

People work together in harmony, encouraging each other to continuously learn, progress, and pursue perfection. Our employees enjoy working as we turn challenges into advantages to share success with each other.

You have a chance to become a part of a friendly and professional team that creates robust software solutions to deliver maximum value to our international clients.

title: Warehouse Supervisor (Executive) / Руководитель складского хозяйства
company: ТОО Coca-Cola İçecek Kazakhstan  ( ТОО СП «Кока-Кола Алматы Боттлерс» )
description:
Join us to take your career journey to the next level!
# ProudlyCCI
Job Identification

We are looking for a Warehouse Supervisor to be a part of our Supply Chain team located in Kazakhstan.
What We Expect

Define the needs in mechanized loading means, capacities and workforce to accept and move raw materials;
Ensure the standards of storage, hand over and transportation of raw materials;
Hold responsibility for the property in the warehouse, warehouse premises, engineering networks and communications, firefighting inventory, as well as for condition of the entrusted machines;
Hold responsibility for observance of HSE requirements by the warehouse personnel;
Manage the acceptance, storage and hand over of raw materials using the warehouse areas most rationally and placing materials by loading zones;
Rationally place raw materials by storage terms and ensure access to any material;
Timely check in the received materials and assign lot numbers on the packages;
Keep the storekeeping rules and regimes regarding raw materials;

Qualifications:

University/special secondary degree
At least 3 years in warehouse management area; experience on managerial positions is preferable
Upper-intermediate level English
Good command of Microsoft Office programs
Strong communication and leadership skills
Material movement terms in accordance with FEFO, FIFO system

We're an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, sex, color, national or social origin, ethnicity, religion, age, pregnancy, disability, sexual orientation, gender expression or political opinion.

What We Embrace:

“People Centered” Focus
Equal Salary Advocate
A Globally Diverse/An International Workplace
Inclusive Team-Building Activities
Digital Learning Opportunities
Leadership Exposure With Organizational Events
Inclusive Language And Culture
Social Clubs/Networks
Inclusive/Family-Friendly Policies

Who We Are

CCI is a multinational beverage company operating in Azerbaijan, Iraq, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Pakistan, Syria, Tajikistan, Turkey, Turkmenistan, and Uzbekistan. CCI produces, distributes, and sells The Coca-Cola Company's sparkling and still beverages. With 30 bottling plants, 3 fruit processing plants, and more than 10,000 employees in 11 countries, CCI offers a wide range of beverages to a consumer base of 430 million.

Our purpose at CCI is to create value for our employees, customers, consumers, and community. In line with our vision to become the best FMCG company, we put people at the core of everything we do. We achieve successful results with our people who come together as One Team, committing to live by our shared values of passion, integrity, accountability, and teamwork. Our ambition is to become a great place to work, which is inclusive, diverse, and inspiring, with its key organizational and leadership capabilities.

Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our commitment at CCI, that's why we nurture it in everything we do. We are proud to become the fourth company to obtain the EQUAL-SALARY global certification and proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer, covering in all our countries.

We take responsibility for the future with our Sustainability Commitments for 2030.

Focusing our roadmap on six main areas, including packaging, water, and climate on environmental issues; human rights, diversity & inclusion, and community investments on social issues, we pledged 9 commitments to continuously improve our efforts. To ensure that by the year 2030, 35% of newly hired individuals, 40% of managerial positions, and 50% of executive committee members are comprised of women.

title: Senior Data Science Engineer
Senior Data Scientist
description:
Задачи, которые ты будешь выполнять:

Подбирать и применять методы машинного обучения, для решения и оптимизации производственных задач, включая обучение, transfer learning и fine-tuning
Решать сложные задачи в сфере NLP, включая тонкую настройку LLM моделей
Разрабатывать и оптимизировать CV-модели, для работы на устройствах различной производительности
Строить сложные пайплайны и ETL-процессы для обработки и подготовки данных
Тестировать и выводить разрабатываемые решения в продакшин


Требования и навыки:

Отличное знание языка Python
Опыт работы с библиотеками numpy и pandas
Отличное знание фреймворков глубокого обучения: опыт разработки нейронных сетей с использованием PyTorch и/или TensorFlow, понимание тонкостей обучения и отладки сложных моделей
Опыт работы с большими языковыми моделями (LLM)
Опыт работы в области компьютерного зрения (CV)
Знания в области линейной алгебры и мат. анализа
Аналитические навыки: способность формализовать задачи, строить математические модели, проводить их анализ и интерпретацию результатов
Опыт работы с большими данными (BigData)
Продвинутые навыки работы с системой контроля версий: Git
Продвинутые навыки работы с инструментом контейнеризации Docker, (опыт работы с Kubernetes будет плюсом)
Знание английского языка на уровне не менее Intermediate


Мы предлагаем тебе:

Работу в международном банке
Возможность работать с коллегами из разных стран
Крутых наставников и коллег
Ежемесячные лимиты на спорт, здоровье, саморазвитие или на заботу о семье
Возможность совмещать работу в офисе и home-office
Кредиты для сотрудников по выгодной ставке
Отсутствие дресс-кода
Внутренние и внешние программы обучения
Курсы английского языка

title: Production Engineer
company: ТОО Coca-Cola İçecek Kazakhstan  ( ТОО СП «Кока-Кола Алматы Боттлерс» )
description:
Production Engineer, Almaty

Join us to take your career journey to the next level!
#ProudlyCCI
Job Identification

We are looking for a Production Engineer to be a part of our Supply Chain team located in Almaty.

Main Responsibilities

Plan, develop and realize protective and preventive maintenance programs in order to ensure compliance of machines
Ensure realization of planned production program
Carry out production according to the defined standards of process and taking actions to improve the process
Ensure that material yields are within company standards
Develop work safety procedures, make sure the team under supervision follows rules
Set up machine maintenances according to plans
Carry out criteria assessments and prepare the report for continuous improvement and performance follow up, present it to management, plan and implement necessary corrective-preventive actions
Determine training needs of foremen, operator and technician
Make sure the team under supervision follows safety procedures and rules
Manage the line OPEX budget and equipment investment projects
Improve the production methods for developing the quality of the packages & products
Manage the spare parts stock level
Ensure that the GMP and 6S rules are followed
Minimize the production costs and losses

Requirements

University Graduate (Mechanical, Electrical / Electronics Engineering)
Minimum 1-2 years experience in production field
Upper-Intermediate level of English
Good command of Microsoft Office programs
Strong communication and leadership skills

title: Middle ML Engineer (NLP)
AI Solutions & Workflow Designer
description:
Key Responsibilities:

Automation Solution Design and Implementation:

Design and implement AI-driven automation solutions that streamline workflows and improve efficiency.
Work with business teams to identify opportunities for automation, including processes that can be enhanced with AI and machine learning.
Leverage tools like Power Automate, RPA, and AI platforms to create seamless automation systems.

Collaboration with Junior Project Manager:

Collaborate closely with the Junior Project Manager to understand business goals and help implement automation strategies.
Translate project requirements into practical automation solutions that enhance overall performance and productivity.
Support in providing technical insights and advice to business teams to help them achieve their automation objectives.

System Integration with IT Teams:

Work with IT teams to ensure smooth integration of automation solutions with existing systems and infrastructure.
Ensure that all automation solutions are scalable, secure, and compatible with internal systems.
Coordinate with IT when necessary to address system limitations or to implement complex integrations.

Process Analysis and Improvement:

Analyze business processes to identify inefficiencies, bottlenecks, and areas that can benefit from AI automation.
Collaborate with stakeholders to define process improvements and develop automation solutions that align with business goals.
Continuously monitor the effectiveness of implemented automation solutions and suggest adjustments for improvement.

Automation Maintenance and Support:

Provide ongoing support for deployed automation systems, ensuring they operate smoothly and efficiently.
Troubleshoot and resolve any issues that arise with automation workflows, liaising with IT when needed for technical resolution.
Update and refine automation workflows based on feedback from end-users and changes in business requirements.

AI and Automation Tool Expertise:

Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, automation technologies, and best practices.
Share knowledge of new tools, features, and techniques with business stakeholders to continuously enhance automation initiatives.
Maintain expertise in tools like Power Automate, RPA platforms, and other automation-related technologies.

User Training and Support:

Help train and onboard business teams on the use of automation tools and solutions.
Provide end-user support to ensure they are fully equipped to utilize automation systems effectively.
Offer training on AI-driven solutions and how they can be used to enhance team productivity.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

Automation Tools and AI Expertise:

Experience working with automation platforms such as Power Automate, RPA tools (e.g., UiPath, Blue Prism), or other automation tools.
Familiarity with AI technologies and platforms used for process automation and data-driven decision-making.
Strong understanding of how AI and automation can drive business efficiency.

Process Improvement and Problem Solving:

Ability to analyze existing workflows and identify opportunities for automation and optimization.
Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to apply AI solutions to improve business processes.

Collaboration and Communication:

Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work closely with business stakeholders to understand their needs and deliver appropriate automation solutions.
Comfortable working with IT teams for system integration and technical troubleshooting.
Ability to explain technical concepts in a simple and understandable manner for non-technical stakeholders.

Project Support and Execution:

Ability to manage tasks effectively and work within project timelines.
Experience supporting project delivery, working with cross-functional teams to ensure timely and successful implementation.

Technical Proficiency:

Familiarity with database management, integration technologies, and system architecture as they relate to automation.
Basic understanding of programming/scripting for automation tasks is a plus (e.g., PowerShell, Python, etc.).

Attention to Detail:

Strong attention to detail in testing, implementing, and maintaining automation solutions.
Ability to ensure that automation workflows are designed and executed correctly, with minimal errors and maximum impact.

Education and Experience:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or a related field.
1-3 years of experience in process automation, AI, or related roles.
Familiarity with AI automation tools, RPA platforms, and process optimization technologies.
Prior experience working with cross-functional teams, especially in a collaborative setting with IT.

Tools and Technologies:

Automation Tools: Power Automate, UiPath, Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, etc.
AI Platforms: Familiarity with AI platforms (e.g., TensorFlow, OpenAI) for automation use cases.
Programming and Scripting: PowerShell, Python, or other relevant scripting languages for automation.
System Integration: Understanding of API integration and connecting automation solutions with internal systems.

title: Middle Data Scientist
company: ТОО Мобайл Телеком-Сервис (Объединенная Компания Tele2/Altel) | IT
description:
Мы ищем опытного специалиста по анализу данных, готового принять вызов и присоединиться к нашей команде в качестве Senior Data Scientist.

Наш идеальный кандидат - это инициативный и талантливый профессионал, обладающий глубокими знаниями в области машинного обучения, статистического анализа и предиктивного моделирования.

ЧТО НУЖНО ДЕЛАТЬ:

Разработка и реализация сложных алгоритмов машинного обучения для улучшения наших продуктов и услуг.
Анализ больших объемов данных и создание прогнозных моделей для помощи в принятии бизнес-решений.
Сотрудничество с другими отделами для определения важных вопросов и разработки подходящих стратегий анализа данных.
Представление сложных технических концепций широкой аудитории.

КАКИЕ НАВЫКИ ВАЖНЫ:

Бакалавр или магистр в области компьютерных наук, статистики, математики или смежной области.
Минимум 2 лет опыта работы в области Data Science.
Знание Python и основных библиотек для обработки данных (numpy, pandas) и машинного обучения (scikit-learn, TensorFlow).
Опыт работы с большими наборами данных и базами данных SQL.
Знание статистических методов анализа и предиктивного моделирования.
Сильные навыки визуализации данных, опыт работы с библиотеками, такими как Matplotlib или Seaborn.
Способность работать в команде, отличные навыки общения.

БОНУСНЫЕ НАВЫКИ:

Опыт работы в секторе телекоммуникаций.
Опыт работы со Spark/Hadoop
Знание систем BI

ЗАРПЛАТА - ЭТО ЕЩЕ НЕ ВСЁ

Гибридный формат работы и гибкое начало рабочего дня;
Профессиональное развитие: участие в митапах, тренингах, конференциях, демо-днях и хакатонах;
Дополнительные 4 дня отпуска — итого 28 календарных дней за год;
Годовой бонус по результатам достижения KPI;
Корпоративная сотовая связь;
Добровольная медицинская страховка со стоматологией и лекарствами с возможностью бесплатно добавить двух близких родственников;
Фитнес-абонементы со скидкой и в рассрочку;
Денежная компенсация за использование личного ноутбука;
Онлайн-платформа бесплатной психологической помощи.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
We are developing three high-performance projects that handle over 40 million monthly calls. In addition to telephony, our platforms offer a full range of features and capabilities, including omnichannel, intelligent routing, analytics, machine learning, and more.

Our infrastructure is located in Europe, Singapore, and the USA, and our global team has 100+ employees and offices on three continents.


Responsibilities:

Proactively contribute to the design of new features, suggesting innovative technical solutions and accurately estimating development timelines.
Integration of DevOps approaches into a team of data engineers.
Creation of efficient CI/CD and other automated solutions.
Provision and improvement of existing infrastructure.
Monitor and troubleshoot internal infrastructure parts.
Write infrastructure code and automation.
Document and share knowledge and best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams.

Requirements:

3+ years of Deployment or Application engineering experience.

Deep knowledge of DevOps methodologies such as CI/CD, IaC, etc.

Strong coding, design, troubleshooting and problem-solving ability in Python.

Deep knowledge of ansible.

Writing well-designed, testable and efficient code.

Proven experience with Containerization and Virtualization.

Experience in developing fault tolerance mechanisms - clustering, replication, scaling
approaches, etc.

Excellent research and troubleshooting skills.

Setting up monitoring solutions.

Nice to have:

Experience working with contact centers, VoIP solutions
Familiar with functional programming
Ability to read and troubleshoot Ruby code

Tech Stack:

Infrastructure as Code: Gitlab, Terraform, Ansible

Environments: Dedicated and Bare-metal

Languages: Ruby, Python, Golang, Rust, Node.js

Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, AMQP, Elasticsearch, ClickHouse

Monitoring: Zabbix, Grafana

We offer:

Competitive compensation: Receive a competitive salary with the potential for annual bonuses based on your contributions.
Collaborate with a diverse and talented team: Work alongside colleagues from around the world, bringing unique perspectives and cultural insights to your projects.
Prioritize your well-being: Stay healthy with comprehensive health insurance, including dental coverage.
Find your work style: Choose between a modern office environment or the flexibility of remote work.
Work-life balance: Set a schedule that works for you with our flexible work arrangements.
Grow your network, earn rewards: Recommend talented friends and get rewarded for successful hires.

title: Senior Data Software Engineer (Big Data)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Data Software Engineer with a deep understanding of Apache Spark, Python/Java/Scala and proficiency with any cloud providers. In this role, you will develop and maintain data pipelines, working closely with cross-functional teams.

If you are passionate about using your data engineering skills to make a significant impact and excel in a collaborative, growth-oriented environment, we encourage you to apply and join us.

The remote option applies only to the Candidates who will be working from any location in Kazakhstan.

What You’ll Do

Develop and maintain data pipelines for efficient data processing and analysis
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business requirements and translate them into technical solutions
Create and maintain technical documentation for all data engineering projects
Work with data scientists to ensure models are production-ready
Ensure all data engineering solutions are high-quality, reliable and scalable
Troubleshoot and resolve data-related issues promptly and efficiently
Stay up-to-date with emerging data engineering technologies and trends
Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to standards

What You Have

3+ years of experience in Data Software Engineering
Expertise in Apache Spark, Python/Java/Scala
Background in developing and maintaining data pipelines
Proficiency in SQL and relational tables
Understanding of SDLC, quality gates and Agile methodologies
B2+ English level, both verbal and written
Hands-on experience with any major cloud provider: Azure, AWS or GCP

Nice to Have

Competency in statistical models and their practical applications
Familiarity with Databricks and MLOps for efficient model deployment and management
Hands-on experience with streaming processing technologies like Kafka, Spark Streaming and Flume
Practical or theoretical knowledge of NoSQL databases

We Offer

We connect like-minded people:
Delivering innovative solutions to industry leaders, making a global impact  
Enjoyable working environment, whether it is the vibrant office or the comfort of your home 
Opportunity to work abroad for up to two months per year 
Relocation opportunities within our offices in 50+ countries
Corporate and social events 
We invest in your growth:
Leadership development, career advising, soft skills and well-being programs 
Certifications, including GCP, Azure and AWS
Unlimited access to LinkedIn Learning, Get Abstract, O'Reilly, Cloud Guru 
Free English classes with certified teachers    
Discounts in local language schools, including online courses for the Kazakh language
We cover it all:
Participation in the Employee Stock Purchase Plan 
Monetary bonuses for engaging in the referral program 
Comprehensive medical & family care package   
Six trust days per year (sick leave without a medical certificate)   
Coverage of psychology sessions of your choice
Discounts for fitness clubs and sports programs
Benefits package (hotels, tech stores, food delivery)

About EPAM

EPAM Kazakhstan is a team of technologists and innovators united by a passion for technology. Today, we operate across all cities with offices in Astana, Almaty, and Karaganda and work with the world's leading companies from different industries. In 2023, EPAM Kazakhstan received the Export Excellence Award at the esteemed Digital Bridge Awards, showcasing our commitment to excellence and innovation

About EPAM

EPAM Kazakhstan is a team of technologists and innovators united by a passion for technology. Today, we operate across all cities with offices in Astana, Almaty, and Karaganda and work with the world's leading companies from different industries. In 2023, EPAM Kazakhstan received the Export Excellence Award at the esteemed Digital Bridge Awards, showcasing our commitment to excellence and innovation
